channel.title: CVE Feed for Delta Electronics -- CNCSoft-G2 DOPSoft
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Delta Electronics -- CNCSoft-G2 DOPSoft

item.title: CVE-2024-4192|2024-04-30T23:01:58.874Z -- Delta Electronics -- CNCSoft-G2 DOPSoft
item.description: Delta Electronics CNCSoft-G2 lacks proper validation of the length of user-supplied data prior to copying it to a fixed-length stack-based buffer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.
